meta.description: Optimize transportation of products to minimize pollution while meeting demand and usage constraints.

params.name: pollution_per_trip
params.description: Pollution generated per trip by each transportation option.

params.name: capacity_per_trip
params.description: Capacity of products each transportation option can carry per trip.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each transportation option.

vars.name: use_vans
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if vans are used.

vars.name: use_electric_vehicles
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if electric vehicles are used.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(trips[o] * pollution_per_trip[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution generated by all trips.

constraints.name: total_products_transport
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(trips[o] * capacity_per_trip[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1800 units of products are transported.

constraints.name: pollution_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(trips[o] * pollution_per_trip[o] for o in TRANSPORT_OPTIONS)
constraints.description: Total pollution must not exceed 2000 units.

constraints.name: trucks_minimum_usage
constraints.description: Trucks must be used at least 10 times.

constraints.name: vans_or_electric_vehicles
constraints.description: Only one of vans or electric vehicles can be used.

constraints.name: vans_usage
constraints.description: Vans can only be used if the use_vans variable is 1.

constraints.name: electric_vehicles_usage
constraints.description: Electric vehicles can only be used if the use_electric_vehicles variable is 1.
